name: MkxBetterVariants

infos.name: Bessere Varianten (Hauptprodukt im Listing)
infos.description:
Wird ein Varianten-Produkt verwendet, gibt es das Problem das man sich für eine Hauptvariante entscheiden oder alle Varianten im Listing anzeigen muss. Die App ermöglicht es Bild, Name und Beschreibung des Hauptprodukts im Listing anzuzeigen und die Varianten

  • als kommaseparierte Liste
  • mit Anzahl der Ausprägungen der Varianten
  • oder die Varianten gar nicht
in der Produktbox darzustellen.

Mehrfachänderung

Haben Sie viele Produkte mit Varianten die Sie auf einmal umstellen möchten, gehen Sie folgendermaßen vor:

  • Markieren Sie die entsprechenden Produkte
  • Nutzen Sie die vom Plugin bereitgestellte Funktion "Hauptvariante zuweisen" (dort wo auf die "Mehrfachänderung" steht)
  • Markieren Sie erneut die entsprechenden Produkte die Sie anpassen möchten
  • Nutzen Sie die Mehrfachänderung von Shopware (ab Version 6.4.5.0) um die Zusatzfelder des Plugins wie gewünscht anzupassen

Kontakt

Fragen und Anregungen nehmen wir gerne unter kontakt@mkx.berlin entgegen. Eine Rückmeldung erhalten Sie in der Regel innerhalb von 2 Stunden.

infos.name: Better Variants (main product in listing)
infos.description:
If a variant product is used, there is the problem that you have to choose one main variant or display all variants in the listing. The app allows you to display the image, name and description of the main product in the listing and the variants

  • as a comma separated list
  • with the number of specifications
  • or not at all
in the product box.

Bulk edit

If you have many products with variants that you want to convert at once, proceed as follows:

  • Mark the appropriate products
  • Use the "Assign main variant" function provided by the plugin (where it says "Bulk edit")
  • Mark the appropriate products again
  • Use the bulk edit of Shopware (from version 6.4.5.0) to configure the custom fields of the plugin as desired

Contact

We are happy to receive questions and suggestions at kontakt@mkx.berlin. You will usually receive a response within 2 hours.
infos.installationManual: Install and activate the plugin as usual.
infos.shortDescription: Instead of using a main variant, the app allows you to display the image, name and description of the main product in the listing, as well as all variants in the product box.
infos.highlights:
Display image, name and description of the main product in the listing
All variants visible in the product box
The lowest variant price is displayed, e.g. "from 16.49 €"
Individually configurable per product

changelog.text: • Compatibility with Shopware 6.5. Due to the many changes in Shopware 6.5, the plugin is no longer compatible with Shopware 6.4 as of version 2.0.
• Exclude categories from the plugin logic, e.g. to display only the reduced variant in a sale category instead of all possible ones.

• Added configuration option to deactivate the plugin in the search results.
  • Added configuration option to indicate to which variant the base price refers.
  • Added option to display the product box in CMS slots.
• Bugfix: Product boxes in Cross Selling have been made consistent with the ones in the listing.

• Option added to also change how the product box is displayed in Cross Selling.
  • The variants with one option are now sorted by position.
  • Bugfix: Unavailable products are no longer shown in the variant list.
• Option added to set a main variant for all selected products (from Shopware 6.4.5.0).

• Option added to show the properties by which a product can be configured.
  • Minor optimizations.
• Bugfix: The "details" button is now displayed correctly for other products in the product listing.
• Bugfix: Variants were loaded in some cases even if this was not activated.

• Bugfix: The display of the base price now matches the display of the price.
  • Improved compatibility with third-party plugins and themes.

• Optimised memory usage when loading many variants.
  • Possibility of not displaying variants. Name, image, description of the parent product are shown.
• Bugfix: The error occurring when SwagSecurityPlugin 1.0.12 was installed alongside the plugin has been removed
• Bugfix: The URLs for variants are generated correctly again.

• Support for variants with more than one group.
  • Improved compatibility with 3rd party themes.
  • The variants appear in sorted order in the listing.
